channel.title: package_feeds_base_adb on Opde Issues Tracker
channel.description: Recent content in package_feeds_base_adb on Opde Issues Tracker

item.title: compile.33
item.description: build number: 33 re-implement command docker pull immortalwrt/opde:sdk docker run -it --rm immortalwrt/opde:sdk zsh # or bash export http_proxy= # [your proxy], do not use localhost or 127.0.0.1 export https_proxy=$http_proxy opde feeds && opde config -a make package/feeds/base/adb/compile -j$(nproc) || make package/feeds/base/adb/compile V=s Compile.txt Applying ./patches/001-create_Makefile.patch using plaintext: patching file adb/Makefile Applying ./patches/003-fix-musl-build.patch using plaintext: patching file adb/usb_linux.c Applying ./patches/010-openssl-1.1.patch using plaintext: patching file adb/adb_auth_host.c Applying ./patches/020-cherry-picked-superspeed-fix.patch using plaintext: patching file adb/usb_linux.

item.title: compile.21
